The user can summon large black cubes which are capable of interfering with the abilities of [[Sensor Type]] individuals. The cubes themselves are very heavy, usually being dropped from above to crush anything below. In the anime, the [[Compression Rasengan]], one of [[Boruto Uzumaki]]'s strongest techniques, was incapable of inflicting any damage to one of the cubes.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]''.
* These cubes can be seen via the [[Genjutsu Communication]] floating in the background when initiated by Isshiki.
* The anime omits the cubes' power to disrupt sensory abilities.
